welcome_message_body: Welcome to Noveleta, Philippines! Known for its beautiful beaches and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to explore our charming city and immerse yourself in its unique beauty. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Noveleta.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is primarily used by Philippine Airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves as the hub for domestic flights of Cebu Pacific and other budget airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 2 hours per day.
